title: Super Mario Bros.
description: A classic side-scrolling platformer where Mario saves Princess Peach from Bowser across colorful worlds.

title: Pac-Man
description: Guide Pac-Man through mazes while avoiding ghosts and eating pellets to rack up points.

title: Space Invaders
description: Defend Earth from waves of alien invaders in one of the earliest shooting games.

title: Donkey Kong
description: Climb ladders, dodge barrels, and rescue Pauline from the mighty Donkey Kong.

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: An epic action-adventure game where Link embarks on a quest to rescue Princess Zelda.

title: Metroid
description: Play as bounty hunter Samus Aran in a sci-fi world filled with exploration and combat.

title: Tetris
description: Arrange falling blocks to complete lines in this iconic puzzle challenge.

title: Street Fighter II
description: Battle iconic fighters in this legendary 2D combat game that defined a genre.

title: Contra
description: Run, jump, and shoot your way through alien forces in this fast-paced side scroller.

title: Mega Man 2
description: Defeat robot masters and absorb their powers in this action-platforming masterpiece.

title: Duck Hunt
description: Use the NES Zapper to shoot ducks as they fly across the screen in this light-gun classic.

title: Castlevania
description: Fight through Dracula’s castle as Simon Belmont using your legendary whip.

title: Punch-Out!!
description: Step into the ring as Little Mac and take on a roster of colorful boxing opponents.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Speed through loops and collect rings as Sega’s blue blur in this iconic platformer.

title: Final Fantasy
description: Embark on a grand adventure filled with heroes, crystals, and turn-based battles.

title: Galaga
description: Blast through alien formations in this arcade shooter sequel to Galaxian.

title: Frogger
description: Guide your frog across roads and rivers to safety while avoiding hazards.

title: Double Dragon
description: Team up to fight street gangs in this side-scrolling martial arts brawler.

title: Excitebike
description: Race across dirt tracks and perform stunts while managing your bike’s temperature.

title: Bomberman
description: Strategically place bombs to eliminate enemies and clear the maze.

title: Dig Dug
description: Dig underground tunnels to defeat monsters by inflating or dropping rocks on them.

title: Paperboy
description: Deliver newspapers while dodging cars, dogs, and other suburban hazards.

title: Out Run
description: Cruise down highways in a Ferrari with branching routes and upbeat music.

title: Q*bert
description: Hop around a pyramid changing cube colors while avoiding enemies.

title: Gauntlet
description: Choose your hero and fight hordes of monsters in this dungeon crawler classic.

title: Bubble Bobble
description: Trap enemies in bubbles and pop them in this cute cooperative platformer.

title: Rampage
description: Destroy cities as giant monsters and survive against military attacks.
Pilot your fighter plane through enemy territory in this WWII vertical shooter.

title: Defender
description: Protect astronauts from alien abduction in this fast-paced side-scrolling shooter.

title: BurgerTime
description: As Chef Peter Pepper, assemble giant burgers while avoiding angry food enemies.

title: Ice Climber
description: Climb icy mountains while breaking blocks and avoiding enemies.

title: Kid Icarus
description: Play as Pit and rise through mythological levels to defeat Medusa.

title: Adventure Island
description: Run, jump, and throw axes across tropical islands to rescue your kidnapped princess.

title: Ghosts 'n Goblins
description: Fight through demons and undead as a knight in this brutally hard platformer.

title: Prince of Persia
description: Solve puzzles and fight guards in a race against time to save the princess.

title: Pole Position
description: Race in the classic Formula One arcade experience with time trials and speed.

title: Adventure
description: Explore a pixelated world to recover the enchanted chalice from a dragon.

title: Pitfall!
description: Swing on vines, jump over pits, and collect treasures in this jungle adventure.

title: Centipede
description: Shoot at a descending centipede while avoiding spiders and other creepy crawlies.

title: Ms. Pac-Man
description: The beloved sequel to Pac-Man featuring new mazes, faster gameplay, and smarter ghosts.
